items.longDescription:
SKATER COLLECTION

Skateboarding culture has become increasingly popular worldwide in recent years. Shinpei Ueno and Alex Olson, both skaters who started out on the streets, are now active in multiple fields, including fashion, design, and film. This collection features their artworks drawn exclusively for UT and a newly developed T-shirt silhouette.

Shinpei Ueno
As well as overseeing TIGHTBOOTH PRODUCTION, he also skates for Evisen Skateboards as a pro skater. He has released many skateboarding videos, and his most well-known work, LENZ II, was highly acclaimed both in Japan and abroad. He works in a wide variety of fields, including direction for a skate shop and apparel brand, and production for numerous brands. LENZ III, which completes the TIGHTBOOTH skateboarding video trilogy, was released worldwide in November 2022.

Shinpei Ueno
items.name: Shinpei Ueno Long Sleeve UT
items.shortDescription: Skateboarding was born from the street. Top skaters from Japan and America are featured in this collection.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.

items.longDescription:
SKATER COLLECTION

Skateboarding culture has become increasingly popular worldwide in recent years. Shinpei Ueno and Alex Olson, both skaters who started out on the streets, are now active in multiple fields, including fashion, design, and film. This collection features their artworks drawn exclusively for UT and a newly developed T-shirt silhouette.

Alex Olson
Alex Olson is a creative from Los Angeles, California, best known for his professional skateboarding from 2007 to 2021. He s the founder of the two brands, Bianca Chandon and Call Me 917. Recently, he s moved back to Los Angeles from New York City. He wanted to be closer to family and surf in unbearably crowded lineups. Alex now spends his time working on his brands, commissioned designs, meditation workshops and making music for various clients.

Alex Olson

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Graphic design inspired by the Wind God and Thunder God hanging scrolls by the great painter and woodblock artist Kawanabe Kysai (18311889).
In Japanese mythology, the Wind God wields a cloth bag that unleashes torrential wind and rain. Since ancient times, the Wind God has been revered for its ability to calm typhoons and storms that wreak havoc on crops.
This sweatshirt the color of traditional Japanese plant-dyes pays tribute to the mighty Wind God on the back, with leaves dancing in the wind on the front.

Japanese Art from the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston

The Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, is one of the premier art institutions in the world. The museum is renowned for its vast collection of Japanese artwork and long history of cultural exchange with Japan. A selection of the museums masterworks from Japan can now be enjoyed in a new collaboration with UNIQLO, inspired by iconic designs including Kawanabe Kysais Wind God and Thunder God, Hasegawa Thakus Dragon and Tiger.

MFABoston
items.name: Boston Museum Long Sleeve Sweatshirt
items.shortDescription: Discover a collection of Japanese masterworks from the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
Graphic design inspired by Dragon and Tiger, a pair of paintings from a six-paneled folding screen by Hasegawa Thaku (15391610), one of the great painters of the Azuchi-Momoyama period.
Noted for its dynamic composition and powerful brushstrokes, this masterpiece depicts a standoff between a dragon (summoner of clouds) and a tiger (stirrer of wind). For this collection, weve recreated the majestic dragon on a cream background the color of Japanese washi paper.

Japanese Art from the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston

The Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, is one of the premier art institutions in the world. The museum is renowned for its vast collection of Japanese artwork and long history of cultural exchange with Japan. A selection of the museums masterworks from Japan can now be enjoyed in a new collaboration with UNIQLO, inspired by iconic designs including Kawanabe Kysais Wind God and Thunder God, Hasegawa Thakus Dragon and Tiger.

MFABoston

Noted for its dynamic composition and powerful brushstrokes, this masterpiece depicts a standoff between a dragon (summoner of clouds) and a tiger (stirrer of wind). Weve captured the ferocious tiger in a T-shirt with a black background the color of calligraphy ink.

items.longDescription:
Graphic design inspired by the Wind God and Thunder God hanging scrolls by the great painter and woodblock artist Kawanabe Kysai (18311889).
The Thunder God has been revered since ancient times as the harbinger of a fertile rice harvest.
In this bold print, weve depicted the powerful Thunder God against a background the color of clay walls found in traditional Japanese homes.

Japanese Art from the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston

The Museum of Fine Arts, Boston, is one of the premier art institutions in the world. items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
HYPEBEAST COMMUNITY CENTER

Hypebeast is a global media platform that focuses on the progression of culture. Four Hypebeast collaborators have come together to curate its own community club, with its unique concept incorporated into the apparel designs. The collection features graphics that are made exclusively for UT and a newly developed T-shirt silhouette.

FaZe Clan
FaZe Clan is a digital-native lifestyle and media platform rooted in gaming and youth culture, reimagining traditional entertainment for the next generation. Founded in 2010 by a group of kids on the internet, FaZe Clan was created for and by Gen Z and Millennials, and today operates across multiple verticals. FaZe Clans roster of more than 100 influential personalities consists of engaging content creators, esports professionals, world-class gamers and a mix of talent who go beyond the world of gaming.

Faze Clan. All rights reserved
items.name: Coach Jacket (Graphic)
items.shortDescription: UT launches a collection featuring four community clubs selected by Hypebeast.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not dry clean

Peaches
Peaches. One Universe is a lifestyle brand that represents the street car culture of the younger generation. Established in Los Angeles and Seoul in 2018, Peaches. One Universe Is building an ever-expanding fandom through captivating media content and engaging cultural experiences while operating its flagship store, Peaches. D8NE.

Peaches. One Universe
